name: WP Social Media Icon
author: Rupak Raj

sections.description: WP Social Media Icon can be used in any theme of wordpress.
sections.installation:
Installing “WP Social Media Icon” can be done either by searching for “WP Social Media Icon” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once plugin is activated, A widget ‘Social Icons’ would be show in widget section of wordpress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing “WP Social Media Icon” can be done either by searching for “WP Social Media Icon” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once plugin is activated, A widget ‘Social Icons’ would be show in widget section of wordpress.
